name: agent-playground
description: A set of patterns for portable agent configuration and tooling.
author: Tom Kirkpatrick <tom@strike.me>

scripts.rulesync:sync: npx rulesync install --frozen && npx rulesync generate --delete
scripts.rulesync:update: npx rulesync install --update && npx rulesync generate --delete
scripts.rulesync:verify: npm run --silent rulesync:sync && npm run --silent rulesync:check
